original_text: And the other two ends of the two wreathen chains thou shalt fasten in the two ouches, and put them on the shoulderpieces of the ephod before it.
korean_text: 두 땋은 사슬의 다른 두 끝을 에봇 앞 두 어깨받이의 금 테에 매고

sentences.original_text: And the other two ends of the two wreathen chains
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 두 사슬의 다른 두 끝은

sentences.original_text: thou shalt fasten in the two ouches
and put them on the shoulderpieces of the ephod
